name: Red Hawk Golf Resort
description: Sparks, NV resort with two championship layouts—The Lakes and The Hills—popular for golf groups, tournaments, and corporate outings.

faqs.question: What’s included in Red Hawk golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times, carts, and concierge planning. Optional transportation, dining, and multi-course itineraries are available.

faqs.question: How much do Red Hawk group packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $219–$429 per golfer depending on lodging, season, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—room blocks, tee-time blocks, tournament setup, and transportation for corporate and leisure groups.

meta.title: Red Hawk Golf | Reno Golf Groups & Stay and Play
meta.description: Book Red Hawk stay and play packages in Reno NV. Play Lakes & Hills with lodging, tee times, and expert group trip planning trusted for 20+ years.
